overview: Month after month the world witnesses hurricanes, terrorist attacks, earthquakes, tsunamis and myriad other life-shattering events.  It Is quite understandable, therefore, that men and women demand a logical answer to the question, "Why would a loving God allow death and suffering?"  That question is answered here. This unique, new DVD was shot on-location in the hurricane-ravaged community of Ocean Springs, Mississippi.  Documentary footage complements the illustrated presentation of AiG's newest speaker, medical internist Dr. Tommy Mitchell.
title: A God of Suffering
